name: local-gifs
title: Local GIFs
description: Search and preview your local gif folder
author: peechiz

commands.name: find-gif
commands.title: Find GIF
commands.description: searches your local GIF folder for the best reaction

preferences.name: gifFolder
preferences.title: Local GIFs Folder
preferences.description: Where did you dump your gifs?

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
